dict.acceptation: 醉的；陶醉的；沉醉；飘飘然；
喝（酒）( drink的过去分词)；饮；喝酒；（尤指）酗酒；

sent.orig: It was said that two types of mixed alcohol drunk easily, but I to get drunk.
sent.trans: 有人说，两种酒混在一起易醉，但我不想醉。

sent.orig: Now he was silently, morosely drunk and, as the evenings progressed, soddenly drunk.
sent.trans: 如今他忧郁地喝闷酒，等到夜色深沉便突然酩酊大醉了。

sent.orig: Earl Piggot: I'm gonna get drunk! I'm gonna get drunk right now! Ah damnit!
sent.trans: 厄尔·佩格特：我正要去喝个烂醉！我这就去喝个烂醉！哦该死的！

sent.orig: For those who sleep, sleep at night, and those who get drunk, get drunk at night.
sent.trans: 因为睡了的人是在夜间睡。醉了的人是在夜间醉。

sent.orig: The mother has drunk dead drunk.
sent.trans: 母亲已经喝得酩酊大醉。
